name: Fractured Universe [Development Stage] v.0.01
description:
A Game In Very Early Stage.

The Idea is to make an open world space game, with tons of explorable planets, lots of spaceships, objectives and places to explore in many ways, from earning credits through mission all the way to stealing expensive objects from high security bases. 

The game will have a 3D and a first person camera mod. With interstellar space stations so you can re-fuel sell valuables that you carry on or fix your spacecraft. 

The project might take up to a year or even more to be in a state of release, there is still allot of work to be done and allot of obsticuls to be overcomed. I hope you like my idea and support me on patreon : https://www.patreon.com/bobcat777?fan_landing=true             or by donating any amount to my paypal paypal.me/petersp1 or on itch io! 

If you have any idea or improvements for the game that you want to see on the final project you can contact me at twitter : https://twitter.com/bobcatn777 

Thank You Very Much In Advance!
